Service Area

Serving communities across East Texas, from Tyler to Longview and beyond.

Why Choose Properties 4 Creations?

Premium Renovations

Every home meets our rigorous renovation standards: new HVAC, roofing, electrical, and plumbing systems.

Veteran-Led

Founded and operated by veterans, for veterans. We understand your needs and are committed to your success.

100% Voucher Acceptance

We accept Section 8, HUD-VASH, and other housing vouchers. No discrimination.

Transparent Process

Clear, honest communication every step of the way. See our full renovation standards and quality commitments.

Support Resources for Veterans & Families

Comprehensive support services available throughout East Texas. We're here to help connect you with the resources you need.

Veteran Services

VA Housing Assistance (HUD-VASH)

Housing assistance program for homeless veterans

Learn More Call 1-800-827-1000

VA Benefits & Services

Comprehensive veteran benefits including healthcare, education, and housing

Learn More Call 1-800-827-1000

Veterans Crisis Line

24/7 confidential support for veterans in crisis

Learn More Call 988

Family Support

Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers

HUD program providing rental assistance for low-income families

Learn More Call 1-800-955-2232

Family Support Services

Support services for military families and veterans' families

Learn More Call 1-800-342-9647

Child Care Resources

Child care assistance and family support programs

Learn More Call 1-866-763-2272

Local East Texas Support

East Texas Veterans Center (Tyler)

Local veteran support and community services

Tyler, TX 903-534-1000

Longview Veterans Affairs

Regional VA services and veteran support

Longview, TX 903-236-7000

Marshall Veterans Services

Community support for veterans and families

Marshall, TX 903-935-4000

Financial & Housing Counseling

Veterans Financial Counseling

Financial planning and counseling services for veterans

Get Help

Housing Counseling Agencies

HUD-approved housing counseling for homeownership and rental assistance

Get Help

Emergency Support

In case of emergency, these resources are available 24/7:

Veterans Crisis Line

24/7 support for veterans in crisis

988

National Domestic Violence Hotline

Support for victims of domestic violence

1-800-799-7233

Childhelp National Child Abuse Hotline

Support for child abuse prevention and intervention

1-800-422-4453

Tyler Longview Jefferson Marshall Kemp Mineola Athens Jacksonville Nacogdoches Lufkin Palestine Canton Wills Point Van Gilmer Henderson Kilgore White Oak Hallsville Waskom

Additional cities and services available. Contact us for specific location assistance.
